name: Twin-T Notch Filter
description: Passive twin-T notch filter buffered by a unity-gain opamp. Provides a deep null at the notch frequency using two T-networks: one resistive (R-2C-R) and one capacitive (C-R/2-C).
design_equations: Resistive T: two resistors R with shunt capacitor 2C
Capacitive T: two capacitors C with shunt resistor R/2
